sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>FS Dispatcher Map Preferences mapping</description>
        <name>FS Dispatcher Map Preferences mapping</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[processAllRecords();
function processAllRecords(){
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_has_role');
	gr.addQuery("role.name", "wm_dispatcher");
	gr.query();
	
	while (gr.next()){
		var pref = new GlideRecord("sys_user_preference");
		pref.addQuery("user", gr.user);
		pref.addQuery("name", "geo_location_user_property");
		pref.query();
		
		while (pref.next()) {
			var prefString = pref.value;
			gs.print(prefString);
			prefString = prefString.replace(/\|/g, "#");
			var prefArray = prefString.split("#");
			var keyValuePair = [];
			var mapTypeSet = false;
			var filter = {};
			
			for (var i = 0; i < prefArray.length; i++) {
				keyValuePair = prefArray[i].split("=");
				var key = keyValuePair[0] ,value = keyValuePair[1];
				
				if ("user" == key) {
					if (value && value.trim() !='')
						filter['user'] = value;
				}
				if ("unassigned" == key) {
					if (value && value.trim() !='')
						filter['unassigned'] = value;
				}
				if ("assigned" == key) {
					if (value && value.trim() !='')
						filter['assigned'] = value;
				}
				if ("myLocation" == key) {
					if (value && value.trim() !='')
						filter['myLocation'] = value;
				}
				if ("agent" == key) {
					if (value && value.trim() !='')
						filter['agent'] = value;
				}
				if ("date" == key) {
					if (value && value.trim() !='')
						filter['on'] = value;
				}
				if ("routingNumbers" == key) {
					if (value && value.trim() !='')
						filter['routingNumbers'] = value;
				}
				if ("mapType" == key) {
					if (value && value.trim() !='')
						filter['mapType'] = value;
				}
				if ("workGroup" == key) {
					if (value && value.trim() !='')
						filter['workGroup'] = value;
				}
			}

			if (filter.mapType.toLowerCase() == 'dispatch') {
				var configGr = new GlideRecord("wm_dispatcher_map_filter");
				configGr.initialize();
				configGr.agent = filter.agent;
				configGr.assigned_tasks = filter.assigned;
				configGr.my_location = filter.myLocation;
				configGr.on = filter.on;
				configGr.routing_numbers = filter.routingNumbers;
				configGr.unassigned_tasks = filter.unassigned;
				configGr.user = filter.user;
configGr.work_group = filter.workGroup;
				configGr.setWorkflow(false);
				configGr.insert();
			}
		}
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-10-31 20:30:18</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>01d329bd0bb222004502ab5c37673ad3</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>FS Dispatcher Map Preferences mapping</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">25371ef01b8a21109c18a9f9bc4bcb1e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_01d329bd0bb222004502ab5c37673ad3</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-10-31 22:29:50</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
